quantities can vary and are therefore approximate requirements use only bendigo yarns as specified accessories 1 set of 3 75mm and 4 00mm knitting needles or size needles to give correct gauge cable needle gauge 22 sts and 30 row to 10cm over stocking stitch using 4 00mm needles abbreviations beg = beginning c3b = slip next 3 sts onto cable needle and leave at back of work k3 then k3 from cable needle k = knit p = purl rem = remaining repeat = repeat decrease = together st/s = stitch/es beanie using a set of 3 75mm needles cast on 96 108 120 132 sts evenly onto 3 needles join being careful not to twist your stitches place a marker to indicate beg of round 1st round right side *k2 p2 repeat from * to end repeat 1st round until band measures 6 8 10 12 cm change to 4 00mm needles place pattern 1st round *k6 p2 k2 p2 repeat from * to end repeat last round another 3 times 5th round *c3b p2 k2 p2 repeat from * to end repeat last 5 rounds until beanie measures approx 13 15 17 19 cm ending with a 5th pattern round note add length here for more slouch in your beanie if desired crown shaping 1st round *k6 p2tog k2 p2 repeat from * to end 88 99 110 121 sts 2nd round *k6 p1 k2 p2
